targets.Name: Carpet
preText:
Welcome to the Asthma Trigger House 

 

The Hallway is a tutorial area to learn how the Asthma Trigger House works.  

  • There are 2 learning phases in each room: 

    •  Phase 1 - Find The Triggers and Phase 2 - Ways To Avoid
       

  • Each room has unique triggers, and specific information about each. 

  • Click on the Brown Boxes at the bottom if you get stuck and need a Hint.

  • Click on the Question Mark (?) in the upper left corner of the room if you need instructions.

  • Follow instructions to work your way through each room.  

  • Turn up the volume on your speakers to hear the sound effects.
     

                      Start the practice session in the hallway now.

                      There are 3 asthma triggers in this room.

     Click on the 1st asthma trigger (HINT: I can be found lying on the floor.)

 

 

 

Great job! Welcome to Phase 2.

 

In this Phase you will be given information on Ways to Avoid Triggers.

  • Find the same 3 triggers.
  • In Phase 2, when you click on the trigger, the trigger will be removed from the room into the Collection Box.
  • Look at the number in the upper left corner to see how many more triggers are left to find.
  • Click the "X" in the upper right corner or outside of the box to close this information box & find the next trigger
  • Now let's get started: click on the Rug to see how to avoid this trigger.
postText:
Great job! You found the 1st Trigger-Dust Mites in the Rug.

  • When you click on the trigger, you can read about it in this box.

  • Click the X to close this window and the rug will go to the collecting box. 

  • The number on the counter will go down from 3 to 2.

  • Find the next trigger.  (Hint: Green doesn’t mean clean!) 

 

Great job! You found the rug. Dust mites in a rug can be an asthma trigger for some people.

  • You will learn How to Avoid This Trigger as you go through the house.

  • When you close this box, the rug will be removed from the room, go into the Collection Box and the counter will go down to 2.

  • NOW click on the Mold for the next step.

targets.Name: Mold
postText:
Great job! You found the Asthma Trigger: Mold.

  • Click on the X to close the box.

  • Look at the number on the upper left corner. How many more triggers need to be found?

  • You have 1 more Trigger to click on. (Hint: What a pest!)

 

  Great job! You found the asthma trigger-Mold

  • In the next rooms you will be learning ways to avoid mold.

  • The total number of triggers on the upper left corner has gone down telling you how many more need to be found.

  • When you close this box, the mold will be removed from the room, go into the Collection Box and the counter will go down to 1.

  • Now, catch the last trigger before it crawls away.

targets.Name: Rat
targets.hint: I squeak out of small places
postText:
Great job! You found the Pest - a mouse. Mice can cause an allergic reaction in some people.  

  • You found all 3 triggers in Phase 1.

  • When you close this box, the counter will be at “0”, the collection boxes below will be full and the screen will change to Phase 2- Ways to Avoid Triggers.

  • Click on the asthma triggers again to learn Ways To Avoid Them.

 

Great job finding the last trigger– A mouse which is a Pest.

  • That pest will now be removed from the room, go into the collecting box, and the counter will go to “0”.

  • This room is now free of all asthma triggers - Yay!

  • Have fun learning about asthma triggers and ways to avoid them in the next room, the bedroom.

  • Click on the “X” or anywhere to close the text box.
